languages.text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

traits.locale_text: Fortress worlds are planets, where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a solider, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

languages.text: 要塞世界的所有居民都沉浸在战争氛围之中。所有人不断接受训练，只为有朝一日被征召入伍，守护帝国，这是他们的庄严使命。要塞世界是对抗帝国之敌的坚实堡垒。要塞世界的所有公民都是士兵，从能拿起武器的那一刻起就在不断接受战斗训练。
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

traits.locale_text: 要塞世界的所有居民都沉浸在战争氛围之中。所有人不断接受训练，只为有朝一日被征召入伍，守护帝国，这是他们的庄严使命。要塞世界是对抗帝国之敌的坚实堡垒。要塞世界的所有公民都是士兵，从能拿起武器的那一刻起就在不断接受战斗训练。

languages.text: Los mundos fortaleza son planetas donde toda la población está sumida en la guerra. Entrenan constantemente esperando el día de defender el Imperium, deber que cumplen solemnemente. Los mundos fortaleza se establecen como baluartes contra el enemigo. Cada ciudadano es un soldado cuyo entrenamiento empieza en cuanto puede sostener un arma.
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

languages.text: Bollwerkwelten sind Planeten, auf denen die gesamte Bevölkerung in Kriegsführung versunken ist. Individuen bereiten sich konstant auf den Tag vor, an dem sie eingezogen werden, um das Imperium zu verteidigen — eine Verantwortung, die von ihnen feierlich aufrechterhalten wird. Diese Welten werden als Bollwerk gegen den Feind aufgebaut. Jeder Bewohner wird zum Soldat ausgebildet, sobald er mit einer Waffe umgehen kann.
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

languages.text: Les mondes forteresses sont des planètes où toute la population est plongée dans la guerre ; tout individu s'entraîne en permanence pour le jour où il sera appelé à défendre l'Imperium, une mission qu'il assume solennellement. Les mondes forteresses sont des remparts contre l'ennemi. Chaque citoyen est un soldat, entraîné à se battre dès qu'il est en âge de manier une arme.
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

Les mondes forteresses sont des remparts contre l'ennemi. Chaque citoyen est un soldat, entraîné à se battre dès qu'il est en âge de manier une arme.

languages.text: Миры-крепости — это планеты, все население которых полностью посвящает себя военному ремеслу. Каждый житель начинает неустанно тренироваться, как только научится держать оружие в руках, чтобы, когда потребуется встать на защиту Империума, быть в полной готовности и исполнить свой долг с мрачной решимостью. Каждый мир-крепость — это надежный оплот, призванный сдерживать натиск врага.
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

Каждый мир-крепость — это надежный оплот, призванный сдерживать натиск врага.

languages.text: 要塞惑星は全ての民衆が戦争に従事している惑星で、彼らが厳粛に崇めている帝国の防衛のため、召集される日に向けて訓練を欠かすことはない。要塞惑星は敵に対する防壁の役割として作られている。全ての国民は戦士であり、武器を手にした瞬間から戦う訓練をされている。
languages.original_text: Fortress worlds are planets where the entire populace is immersed in warfare; they constantly train for the day that they may be called upon to defend the Imperium, a charge they solemnly uphold. Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.

languages.text: Kale dünyalar, tüm halkın savaşa sürüklendiği gezegenlerdir. Bu insanlar, İmparatorluk'u savunmaya çağrılmayı bekleyerek sürekli talim yaparlar. O gün gelip çattığında da vazifelerini ciddiyetle üstlenirler. Kale dünyalar, düşmana karşı kalkan oluşturma maksadıyla kurulur. Her vatandaş birer askerdir ve eli silah tuttuğu andan itibaren savaşmak için eğitilir.

Fortress worlds are established as bulwarks against the enemy. Every citizen is a soldier, trained to fight from the moment they can handle a weapon.
